text:
●基本體態與動作為模板無法修改。
●種族不限，但如包含複雜的角、翅膀等會需要評估。
●各部件可更改顏色與選擇穿戴與否。 (預設僅提供一個組合版本)
●可交由畫家設計搭配，或參考指引圖看看是否有想調整的部件。
●可些微增加額外配件，需討論。
●含一張PNG檔去背版本和冒險者酒館背景版本。
●預設尺寸為 4600 X 6000 像素。
【訂購流程與付款方式】
trans:
● The basic body shape and movements are templates and cannot be modified.
● No restrictions on race, but complex features like angles or wings may require evaluation.
● Each part's color and whether it is worn can be changed. (Only one combination version is provided by default)
● The design can be left to the artist or refer to the guide image to see if any parts need adjustment.
● Slight additional accessories can be added, discussion required.
● Includes one PNG file with transparent background and one with an adventurer's tavern background.
● The default size is 4600 X 6000 pixels.
【Order Process and Payment Methods】
